greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of different values of A000005(m) when A056239(m) is equal to n.
comment: Number of distinct values of Product_{k=1..n} (m(k,P)+1) where m(k,P) is multiplicity of part k in partition P, as P ranges over all partitions of n. - _Vladeta Jovovic_, May 24 2008
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..222
maple: for p from 1 to n do
b:= proc(n, i) option remember; `if`(n=0 or i<2, {n+1},
mathematica: b[n_, i_] := b[n, i] = If[n==0 || i<2, {n+1}, Table[b[n-i*j, i-1]*(j+1), {j, 0, n/i}] // Flatten // Union]; a[n_] := Length[b[n, n]]; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 50}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jan 08 2016, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
results.author: _Naohiro Nomoto_, Nov 28 2003
